ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: The onlywizard modifier restricts critical functions like sweepCommission and transferOwnership.
ImplementedSecurityControls.MonetaryThresholds: Checks in claimThrone ensure only sufficient funds allow throne claims, preventing partial payments.

FallbackFunctionality.FallbackFunction: claimThrone is called via fallback function with the name embedded in msg.data, allowing default throne claims on transactions.
